name: E.E. Ward Moving & Storage
description: E.E. Ward is the oldest African-American owned business in the United States, founded in 1881. They are a full-service moving company that specializes in handling delicate and high-value items, including art. They offer custom crating, protective packaging, and white-glove transport protocols
services: Black-owned Artwork moving in Ohio consultation
